eating that cake was so delicious .
the evening ended with a beautiful sunset .
output.sentences: As Anna and Tom finally tied the knot, they realized just how lucky they were to be standing there today.
Their family and friends supported their long, difficult journey to find love, reminding them to never give up.
As the party continued, they realized every detail of their day was perfect, the food being no exception.
But the greatest part of it all was realizing that every misstep had led to this perfect moment in time.
The perfect day ended with the perfect sunset, a reminder that a new dawn was soon rising before them.
